channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Chicago’s Mexican Independence Day celebrations shadowed by Trump’s threats for the city
item.description: President Donald Trump’s plan to dispatch National Guard troops and immigration agents into Chicago has put many Latino residents on edge.

item.title: Homeland security official says 475 people were detained during an immigration raid in Georgia
What to know about a large-scale immigration raid at a Hyundai manufacturing plant in Georgia
